title: Change minimum deposit amount to 10 rupees

requirements.text: Update the minimum deposit amount validation in the backend from its current value to 10 rupees (₹10). Reject any deposit requests below this threshold with an appropriate error message.
acceptanceCriteria: Deposit requests with an amount less than 10 are rejected by the backend with a clear error.
Deposit requests with an amount of exactly 10 or more are accepted by the backend.

requirements.text: Update the minimum deposit amount displayed and enforced in the ManualDepositModal frontend component to ₹10. The input field should show a minimum value of 10, and client-side validation should prevent submission of amounts below ₹10 with an error message stating the minimum is ₹10.
acceptanceCriteria: The deposit amount input enforces a minimum value of 10.
Submitting an amount below ₹10 shows a validation error: 'Minimum deposit amount is ₹10'.
The modal UI clearly indicates that the minimum deposit is ₹10.

constraints: Do not change any other deposit logic or UPI payment flow beyond the minimum amount threshold.
nonGoals: Changing UPI deep link construction or screenshot upload logic.
